name: Dapp.com
public_notice: DAPPT will undergo a 1:1 token swap and contract migration from 0x386cabc0b14a507a4e024dea15554342865b20de to 0x96184d9c811ea0624fc30c80233b1d749b9e485b with snapshot taken on block 11097473 at 04:00 AM UTC on 21, October 2020. For more information, please refer to https://www.dapp.com/article/statement-regarding-the-kucoin-hack-and-dappt-swap-arrangement
